targets.query: SELECT sum("mean") FROM (SELECT mean("running") FROM "six_month"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval) fill(none)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("max") FROM (SELECT max("pendingTasks") FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval) fill(null)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("max") FROM (SELECT max("pendingTasks") FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "workerType", time($__interval * 10) fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval * 10)

SELECT sum("running") / sum("workers") as "max", sum("rmean") / sum("wmean") as "mean" FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "workers", max("running") as "running", mean("workers") as "wmean", mean("running") as "rmean" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval)) GROUP BY time($interval * 2) fill(none)

SELECT sum("running") / sum("workers") as "max", sum("rmean") / sum("wmean") as "mean" FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "workers", max("running") as "running", mean("workers") as "wmean", mean("running") as "rmean" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

SELECT sum("running") / sum("workers") as "max", sum("rmean") / sum("wmean") as "mean" FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "workers", max("running") as "running", mean("workers") as "wmean", mean("running") as "rmean" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval)) GROUP BY time($interval * 2) fill(none)

SELECT sum("running") / sum("workers") as "max", sum("rmean") / sum("wmean") as "mean" FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "workers", max("running") as "running", mean("workers") as "wmean", mean("running") as "rmean" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

SELECT sum("running") / sum("workers") as "max" FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "workers", max("running") as "running" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval)) GROUP BY time(6h) fill(none)

SELECT HOLT_WINTERS_WITH_FIT(first("max"),21,7) FROM (SELECT sum("running") / sum("workers") as "max" FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "workers", max("running") as "running" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval)) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

SELECT HOLT_WINTERS_WITH_FIT(first("max"),28,28) FROM (SELECT sum("running") / sum("workers") as "max" FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "workers", max("running") as "running" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType", time($interval)) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)) GROUP BY time(6h) fill(none)
SELECT last("running") FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE time > now() - 30m limit 1
SELECT count("count") FROM (SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE "event" = 'task' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", time(20m) fill(none)) GROUP BY time(20m) fill(previous)
SELECT count("count") FROM (SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE "event" = 'task' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", time(30m) fill(none)) GROUP BY time(30m) fill(linear)
SELECT count("count") FROM (SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE "event" = 'task' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", time(12h) fill(none)) GROUP BY time(12h)

SELECT mean("mean"), max("max") FROM (SELECT max("count"), mean("count") FROM (SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE ("event" = 'no task' OR "event" = 'task') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "event", time(1m) fill(none)) GROUP BY "event", time(10m)) GROUP BY "event", time(3h)

SELECT ((max("count") + mean("count"))/2) as "level" FROM (SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE ("event" = 'no task' OR "event" = 'task') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "event", time(1m) fill(none)) GROUP BY "event", time(10m)
SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE "event" = 'no task' OR "event" = 'task' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "event", time(10m)
SELECT mean("running") as "tc count", mean("pendingTasks") as "queue" FROM /^tc_queue/ WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(previous)

SELECT max("count"), mean("count"), ((max("count") + mean("count"))/2)as "level" FROM (SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE ("event" = 'no task' OR "event" = 'task') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "event", time(1m) fill(none)) GROUP BY "event", time(10m)

SELECT mean("mean"), max("max") FROM (SELECT max("count"), mean("count") FROM (SELECT count("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE ("event" = 'no task' OR "event" = 'task') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "event", time(1m) fill(none)) GROUP BY "event", time(10m)) GROUP BY "event", time(3h)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("running") as "value" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" != 'releng-hardware' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("running") as "value" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

SELECT sum("count") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "count" FROM "autogen"."papertrail" WHERE "event" =~ /task start/ AND "host" !~ /(DESKTOP|\.mdc[12]\.)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", time(6h)) GROUP BY time(6h)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("workers") as "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND "workerType" !~ /gamma$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("pendingTasks") AS "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "provisionerId" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(6h)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "autogen"."papertrail" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("count") AS "count" FROM "papertrail" WHERE "event" =~ /task start/ AND "host" =~ /\.mdc[12]\./ AND "host" =~ /${hostname}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("count") AS "count" FROM "papertrail" WHERE "event" =~ /task start/ AND "host" !~ /\.mdc[12]\./ AND "host" =~ /${hostname}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(linear)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("workers") as "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND "workerType" !~ /gamma$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("workers") as "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" != 'releng-hardware') AND "workerType" !~ /gamma$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'aws-provisioner-v1') AND "workerType" !~ /gamma$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1h) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("workers") as "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND "workerType" !~ /gamma$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT mean("workers") as "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" != 'releng-hardware') AND "workerType" !~ /gamma$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM (SELECT max("workers") as "value" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'aws-provisioner-v1') AND "workerType" !~ /gamma$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1h) fill(previous)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "provisionerId"
list.name: provisioner
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "provisionerId"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
list.name: workerType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
